/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
